mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, real_name = #{real_name}, nick_name = #{nick_name}, email = #{email}, birth_date = #{birth_date}, rating = #{rating}, create_time = #{create_time}, WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users u WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM item i WHERE i.user_id = u.user_id AND i.item_status = '대여중' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM rental r WHERE r.user_id = u.user_id AND r.rental_status = '대여중' )
